B

Beacon - Interface in net.antoniy.beacon
Beacon provides a service for discovering devices in LAN network.
BeaconDeviceEventListener - Interface in net.antoniy.beacon
This interface is used by listeners of device related events and defines methods for handling the events.
BeaconEventListener - Interface in net.antoniy.beacon
This interface is used by listeners of beacon service events and defines methods for handling the events.
BeaconException - Exception in net.antoniy.beacon.exception
Exception class for general beacon service exceptions.
BeaconException(String) - Constructor for exception net.antoniy.beacon.exception.BeaconException
 
BeaconFactory - Class in net.antoniy.beacon.impl
This class is used to create instances needed for the beacon service.
BeaconFactory() - Constructor for class net.antoniy.beacon.impl.BeaconFactory
 
BeaconParams - Interface in net.antoniy.beacon
BeaconParams is used to store initialization parameters for the Beacon service.
beaconStopped() - Method in interface net.antoniy.beacon.BeaconEventListener
This method is invoked when the beacon service stops.
BeaconStoppedException - Exception in net.antoniy.beacon.exception
Exception class for beacon service stopped state.
BeaconStoppedException(String) - Constructor for exception net.antoniy.beacon.exception.BeaconStoppedException
